name: The Arena Wizard
description:
In The Area Wizard, you play as a wizard with only a book and a teleport spell, attempting to survive and fight off red turrets and giant slimes.

It is a never-ending arena top-down shooter where your only weapon is a book that you throw around and have to pickup to use again.  All the noises were self recorded, and all the art was made by me (hence why it's poor quality)

I later plan on adding more and changing the art of some things, but for now I'm just seeing if people like the idea.

This is my first game with sound and my first game using Construct3, so please don't expect too much.

(Full screen Recommended)

(Warning: May be loud!)

-Controls-

-Arrows for movement

-Left click to throw your book

-Right click to teleport

-ENEMIES-

Turret cube: They walk around randomly and shoot at any wizard they see

Drops: NONE

Slime: The first mini boss, they have 10 HP and must have the book in them for a full second to take damage. Books shoot right through them, making damaging them a bit harder.  (TIP: Try shooting a turret cube that is inside of the slime to hit them)

Drops: Blood(+1 HP)
